Translations.Text: He loka konatya gostici vicarapusa karita aheta
Tya mothya khabarici
Jyababata he aneka mata (vicara) rakhatata
Niscitapane he ataca januna ghetila
Punha niscitapane tyanna phara lavakara mahita padela
Kaya amhi jaminila bicha'ita nahi banavile
Ani parvatanna mekha nahi banavile
Ani amhi tumhala jodi jodine nirmana kele
Ani amhi tumacya jhopela tumacya aramace karana banavile
Ani ratrila amhi padada (avarana) banavile
Ani divasala amhi roji prapta karanyaca samaya banavile
Ani tumacya varati amhi sata majabuta akasa banavile
Ani eka cakakanara tejasvi dipa nirmana kela
Ani dhagandvare amhi musaladhara parjan'yavrsti keli
Yasathi ki tyadvare anna (dhan'ya) ani vanaspati ugavavyata
Ani ghanadata bagahi (ugavavya)
Nihsansaya, nirnayaca divasa nirdharita ahe
Jya divasi sura (sankha) phunkala ja'ila, maga tumhi sarva jhundacya jhunda banuna yala
Ani akasa ughadale ja'ila, tevha tyata dareca dare banatila
Ani parvata calavile jatila, tevha te pandhari valu banatila
Nihsansaya, jahannama tapuna basali ahe
Vidrohi (udanda) lokance thikana teca ahe
Tyata te yuganuyuge (ani satake) paduna rahatila
Na kadhi tyata sitalateci godi cakhatila, na panyaci
Garama (ukalate) pani ani vahatya pu-kherija
(Tyanna) purnapane mobadala milela
Tyanna tara hisobaci asaca navhati
Te nidaratene amacya ayatinna khote tharavita asata
Amhi pratyeka gosta lihuna suraksita thevali ahe
Ata tumhi (apalya karmanca) svada cakha. Amhi tumacya siksetaca vadhakarita rahu
Nihsansaya, allahace bhaya rakhanaryankarita saphalata ahe
Baga aheta ani drakse aheta
Ani navayuvati kumarika samavayaska striya aheta
Ani bharuna vahanare madyace pyale aheta
Tithe na tara te aslila gosti aikatila ani na khotya gosti aikatila
(Tyanna) tumacya palanakartyatarphe (tyancya satkarmanca) ha mobadala milela, jo phara mothe baksisa asela

(Tya) palanakartyatarphe milela, jo akasanca ani jaminica, ani je kahi tyancya daramyana ahe, tya sarvanca svami va palanakarta ahe, ani motha dayavana ahe. Konalahi tyacyasi bolanyaca adhikara nasela
Jya divasi ruha (atma) ani phariste ranga bandhuna ubhe asatila tevha koni bolu sakanara nahi, matra jyala atisaya dayavana (rahamana) anumati de'ila, ani to ucita gosta tondatuna kadhila (bolela)
Ha divasa satya ahe, ata jyaci iccha asela tyane apalya palanakartyajavala (satkarme karuna) sthana banavave

Amhi tumhala nikata bhavisyata ghaduna yenarya siksa yatanece bhaya dakhavile (ani savadha kele) jya divasi manusya apalya hatanni kelelya kama'i (karma) la pahila ani kaphira mhanela ki, mi mati jhalo asato tara (bare jhale asate)
Buduna kathoratapurvaka khecanaryanci sapatha
Bandhana ukaluna sodavinaryanci sapatha
Ani pohanarya phiranaryanci sapatha
Maga dhavata pudhe janaryanci sapatha
Maga karyaci yojana karanaryanci sapatha
Jya divasi tharathara kampanari tharathara kampela
Tyanantara eka mage yenari (magomaga) ye'ila
(Aneka) hrdaya tya divasi dhadadhada karatila
Jyancya najara khali asatila
Ase mhanatata ki, kaya amhala pahilyasarakhya avasthekade punha paratavile ja'ila
Kaya asa veli ki jevha amhi agadi jirnasirna hade ho'una ja'u
Mhanatata ki maga tara he paratane nukasanadayaka ahe. (Mahita asale pahije)
Ki ti tara kevala eka (bhayanaka) daradavani ahe
(Ji dili jataca) te ekadama maidanata jama hotila
Kaya, musa (alaihis'salama) ca vrttanta tumhasa pohacala ahe
Jevha tyanna tyancya palanakartyane tuvacya pavitra maidanata pukarale
(Ki) tumhi phira'aunajavala ja, tyane bandakhori (udandata) angikarali ahe
Tyala sanga ki, kaya tu svatahci durusti ani sudharana icchito
Ani he ki mi tula tujhya palanakartyaca marga dakhavu yasathi ki tu (tyace) bhaya balagu lagave
Tevha tyala mothi nisani dakhavili
Tara tyane khote tharavile ani avajna keli
Maga punha paratala prayatna karita
Maga sarvanna ekatra karuna unca svarata ailana kele
Mhanala, tumha sarvanca palanahara mica ahe
Tevha (sarvocca va sarvasrestha) allahane dekhila tyala akhirata (maranottara jivana) cya ani ya jagacya siksa - yataneta gherale
Nihsansaya, yata tya manasakarita bodha ahe, jo bhaya rakhila
Kaya tumhala nirmana karane adhika kathina ahe kinva akasala? Sarvasrestha allahane tyala nirmana kele
Tyaci unci vadhavili, maga tyala yathayogya kele
Ani tyacya ratrila andhakarapurna banavile ani tyacya divasala prakata kele
Ani tyanantara jaminila (samatala) bichavile
Tyatuna pani ani cara kadhala
Ani parvatanna (majabuta) rovale
He sarva tumacya ani tumacya janavarancya phayadyasathi (ahe)
Tara jevha te mothe sankata (kayamata) ye'ila
Jya divasi manusya apalya kelelya karmanci athavana karila
Ani (pratyeka) pahanaryacya samora jahannama ughadapane anali ja'ila
Tevha, jya (manasa) ne vidroha angikarala (asela)
Ani aihika jivanala pradhan'ya dile (asela)
(Tyace) thikana jahannamaca ahe
Tathapi, jo manusya apalya palanakartyasamora ubhe rahanyapasuna bhita rahila asela ani apalya manala iccha-abhilasampasuna rokhale asela
Tara tyace thikana jannataca ahe
Loka tumhala kayamata kevha ghaduna ye'ila ase vicaratata
Te sanganyasi tumaca kaya sambandha
Ticya jnanaci antima sima tara allahakade ahe
Tumhi tara phakta ticyasi bhayabhita rahanaryanna savadhana karanare ahata
Jya divasi he tila (pratyaksa) pahuna ghetila tevha ase vatela ki kevala divasaca antima bhaga athava arambhica bhagaca te (ya jagata) rahileta
